data.title: University of Mississippi Foundation
data.meta_site_name: University of Mississippi Foundation - Support the University Of Mississippi
data.text:
Your gracious gifts support our students, faculty, staff, programs and facilities. Your generosity helps make our students’ dreams of success a reality by preparing them to have a transformative impact on the world around them. Your gifts help ensure that our beloved university boasts top faculty in their disciplines and greater excellence in education through enhanced curricula. Additionally, we have you to thank for our state-of-the-art labs, classrooms, health and wellness centers, fields and courts of play and so much more. Thank you for your support of Ole Miss!

Cumulative Giving Societies

Barnard Society

The Barnard Society recognizes lifetime cumulative giving of $5 million and above to the Oxford campus. This society is named for one of the university’s oldest buildings, Barnard Observatory, which was designed by Chancellor Frederick A.P. Barnard to house the world’s largest telescope though the building was never used for that purpose.

Lyceum Society

The Lyceum Society, named for the University’s first academic structure and current administration building, recognizes lifetime cumulative giving of $1 million and above to the Oxford campus. The Lyceum’s columned façade is represented on the university’s official crest.

Circle Society

The Circle Society, reflecting the renowned green space in the heart of campus, recognizes lifetime cumulative giving of $100,000 and above to the Oxford campus. The Circle, with its majestic oak and magnolia trees, blooming foliage and vibrant flowers, is dearly beloved by all who’ve walked its pathways.
